snippet: It was the latest of several clashes to take a heavy toll on the security forces as American combat forces leave the country.
abstract: Eight Afghan paramilitary soldiers are killed during an assault on a Taliban hide-out in eastern Afghanistan, in latest of several clashes to take a heavy toll on security forces as American combat forces leave the country.

byline.contributor: Farooq Jan Mangal contributed reporting from Khost, Afghanistan, and Ahmad Shakib from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: It was the latest of several clashes to take a heavy toll on the security forces as American combat forces leave the country.

headline.main: Car Bomb Kills 8 Afghans From Unit Linked to C.I.A.
headline.print_headline: Car Bomb Kills 8 Afghans From Unit Linked to C.I.A.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
